script.name: !ship.cmd.packstation.std
script.sourceplaintext:
$sector = $a.station -> get sector @ if not [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.checkvalidroute : Destination Sector=$sector Allow Target=[TRUE] Command Rejected Sound=[TRUE] return FLRET_NOPATH end
[THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_PACK_STATION
$tSwapStations = table alloc $tSwapStations[Terran Orbital Laser Factory M] = Terran Orbital Laser Factory M $tSwapStations[Terran Fusion Beam Cannon Forge] = Terran Fusion Beam Cannon Forge
$tValues = table alloc
if $a.station -> is of class Headquarters * save and clear the production queue $queue = $a.station ->get HQ production queue if $queue $tValues['productionqueue'] = $queue $i = size of array $queue $aCounts = array alloc: size=$i while $i dec $i = $item = $queue[$i] $count = $a.station ->get HQ production item count: $item $aCounts[$i] = $count $a.station ->remove from HQ production queue: $item Amount=$count end $tValues['productioncounts'] = $aCounts end
* save and clear the reverse engineering queue $queue = $a.station ->get HQ reverse engineering queue if $queue $tValues['reversequeue'] = $queue $i = size of array $queue while $i dec $i = $item = $queue[$i] $a.station ->remove from HQ reverse engineering queue: $item end $aReverseQueue = $queue end
$queue = $a.station ->get HQ repair queue if $queue $tValues['repairqueue'] = $queue $i = size of array $queue while $i dec $i = $item = $queue[$i] $a.station ->remove from HQ repair queue: $item end $aRepairQueue = $queue end
$queue = $a.station ->get HQ recycle queue if $queue $tValues['recyclequeue'] = $queue $i = size of array $queue while $i dec $i = $item = $queue[$i] $a.station ->remove from HQ recycle queue: ship=$item end $aRecycleQueue = $queue end
$blueprints = $a.station ->get HQ blueprints $tValues['blueprints'] = $blueprints
$queue = $a.station ->get HQ loadout ids if $queue $tLoadouts = table alloc $i = size of array $queue while $i dec $i = $item = $queue[$i] $shiptype = $a.station ->get HQ loadout type: id=$item $name = $a.station ->get HQ loadout name: id=$item $tWares = $a.station ->get HQ loadout wares: id=$item flags=null $aWeapons = $a.station ->get HQ loadout weapon order: id=$item $aLoadout = create new array, arguments=$shiptype, $name, $tWares, $aWeapons, null $tLoadouts[$item] = $aLoadout end $tValues['loadouts'] = $tLoadouts end $a.station ->set HQ queues: enabled=[FALSE] else $a.station ->factory production task: on=[FALSE] end
if $a.station -> is of class Factory if $a.station ->is factory upgraded $scale = $a.station ->get station scale factor $tValues['upgrade'] = $scale end $progress = $a.station ->get factory upgrade progress $tValues['upgradeprogress'] = $progress end
$task = [THIS] -> get next available task: starting=[Task.StartFree] [THIS] ->start task $task with script !lib.packstation.watch and prio 100: arg1=$a.station arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
$i = 10 while $i <= 20 $a.station ->start task $i with script !lib.interrupt and prio 100: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null inc $i = end
* dock at the station to pack (or get closoe for freight drones $useDrones = $a.station -> is docking possible of [THIS] $useDrones = ! $useDrones
$read.text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2077, $a.station, null, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$read.text [THIS] ->set destination to $a.station
if $useDrones $sector = $a.station -> get sector while [SECTOR] != $sector @ = wait 1000 ms @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.cmd.movesector.std : target sector=$sector end
$station.size = $a.station -> get size of object $ship.size = [THIS] -> get size of object $range = ( $station.size + $ship.size ) + 2000 @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetoobject.samesector : Target=$a.station Range=$range else while [DOCKEDAT] != $a.station @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$a.station @ = wait 1000 ms end end
if $useDrones $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2080 else $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2079 end [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$read.text [THIS] ->set destination to null
* move wares into cargo hold $type.product = table alloc $type.resource = table alloc $type.storage = table alloc $type.tradeable = table alloc
$saveWares = array alloc: size=0 $aWares = $a.station -> get tradeable ware array from station if $aWares $i = size of array $aWares while $i dec $i = $ware = $aWares[$i]
if $a.station -> is of class Dock if $a.station ->is ware a product: ware=$ware $type.product[$ware] = $ware else if $a.station ->is ware a resource: ware=$ware $type.resource[$ware] = $ware else if $a.station ->is ware for storage: ware=$ware $type.storage[$ware] = $ware else if $a.station ->is ware a tradeable: ware=$ware $type.tradeable[$ware] = $ware end end
$amt = $a.station -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay if $amt if $ware == Credits continue else if not is equipment: ware=$ware skip if $useDrones = [THIS] ->load $amt units of $ware, ignore minimum=[FALSE] append $ware to array $saveWares append $amt to array $saveWares end end end end
if $a.station -> is of class Dock $tValues['type.product'] = $type.product $tValues['type.resource'] = $type.resource $tValues['type.storage'] = $type.storage $tValues['type.tradeable'] = $type.tradeable end
* if we ar using drones, then pick up the wares if $useDrones @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.freighttransfer : Target Ship=$a.station Wares to send=null Wares to receive=$saveWares Unload?=[TRUE] end
$credits = $a.station -> get money if $credits $tValues['credits'] = $credits $a.station ->transfer to player account: money=$credits, auto=[FALSE] end
$tValues['savedwares'] = $saveWares
$table = table alloc $arr = $a.station -> get tradeable ware array from station $i = size of array $arr while $i dec $i = $ware = $arr[$i] $amt = $a.station -> get price of ware $ware $table[$ware] = $amt end $tValues['warecost'] = $table
* wait until the production has finished $production = [TRUE] while $production @ = wait 2000 ms $production = [FALSE]
if $a.station -> is of class Headquarters do if $a.station ->get HQ current production $production = [TRUE] do if $a.station ->get HQ current reverse engineering $production = [TRUE] do if $a.station ->get HQ current repair $production = [TRUE] do if $a.station ->get HQ current recycle $production = [TRUE] else do if $a.station ->get factory production start time $production = [TRUE] end if $a.station -> is of class Factory do if $a.station ->is factory upgrading $production = [TRUE] end end
$aFollow = array alloc: size=0
* undock all other ships $undocking = [TRUE] $aDocked = array alloc: size=0 while $undocking $undocking = [FALSE] $aShips = $a.station -> get ship array from sector/ship/station
if $aShips $i = size of array $aShips while $i dec $i = $ship = $aShips[$i] do if $ship == [THIS] continue $undocking = [TRUE] if $ship -> is task 0 in use $ship ->interrupt with script !move.undock and prio 100 else $owner = $ship -> get owner race if $owner == Player @ START $ship -> call script !move.undock : append $ship to array $aFollow gosub sub.IsInQueue skip if $found append $ship to array $aDocked else @ START $ship -> call script !move.undock : end end end
@ = wait 5000 ms end end $tValues['docked'] = $aDocked
if $a.station -> is of class Headquarters $blueprints = $a.station ->get HQ blueprints $tValues['blueprints'] = $blueprints end
$aShips = $a.station -> get owned ships: class/type=Ship $tValues['ownedships'] = $aShips
* do all the factory settings $hull = $a.station -> get hull $tValues['hull'] = $hull $name = $a.station -> get name $tValues['name'] = $name $serial = $a.station -> get serial name of station $tValues['serial'] = $serial $value = $a.station ->get max buy jumps $tValues['jumps.buy'] = $value $value = $a.station ->get max sell jumps $tValues['jumps.sell'] = $value $value = $a.station -> only player own ships can trade with $tValues['npc.trade'] = $value $value = $a.station ->get don't show warnings $tValues['no.warning'] = $value $value = $a.station ->should station manager repair ship with shipyards $tValues['mgr.repair.sy'] = $value $value = $a.station ->should station manager repair ship with HQ $tValues['mgr.repair.hq'] = $value $value = $a.station ->should station manager upgrade ships $tValues['mgr.upgrade'] = $value if $a.station -> is of class Headquarters $value = $a.station ->should station manager stock for loadouts $tValues['mgr.loadout'] = $value end $value = $a.station ->get station manager minimum money $tValues['mgr.min.mony'] = $value $value = $a.station ->get station manager minimum upgrade money $tValues['mgr.min.upgrade'] = $value $value = $a.station ->get station manager minimum buy ship money $tValues['mgr.min.buy'] = $value $value = $a.station ->get station manager minimum repair money $tValues['mgr.min.repair'] = $value $value = $a.station ->should station manager replace ships at shipyards $tValues['mgr.replace.sy'] = $value $value = $a.station ->should station manager replace ships at HQ $tValues['mgr.replace.hq'] = $value $value = $a.station ->is favourite in property list $tValues['favourite'] = $value $value = $a.station ->is hidden in property list $tValues['hidden'] = $value $value = $a.station ->get property custom group do if $value $tValues['prop.group'] = $value $value = $a.station -> get local variable: name='transfer.values' do if $value $tValues['transfer.values'] = $value
$value = $a.station -> get local variable: name='egosoft.stationmgr.wage' do if $value $tValues['mgr.wage'] = $value $value = $a.station -> get local variable: name='egosoft.stationmgr.unpaid' do if $value $tValues['mgr.unpaid'] = $value $value = $a.station -> get local variable: name='stationmgr.restrict' do if $value $tValues['mgr.restrict'] = $value $value = $a.station -> get local variable: name='graph.data' do if $value $tValues['graph.data'] = $value
$value = $a.station ->get supply stations do if $value $tValues['mgr.supply'] = $value $value = $a.station ->get minimum storage table do if $value $tValues['minimum.storage'] = $value
$tAgents = table alloc $agents = get all agents: race=Player if $agents $i = size of array $agents while $i dec $i = $agent = $agents[$i] $homebase = $agent -> get homebase if $homebase == $a.station $tAgents[$agent] = $agent $env = $agent -> get environment if [TRUEOWNER] != Player $agent ->set homebase to [PLAYERSHIP] else $agent ->set homebase to [THIS] end if $env == $homebase $agent ->put into environment null end end end if size of table $tAgents $tValues['agents'] = $tAgents end end
$stationWare = $a.station -> get ware type code of object do if $tSwapStations[$stationWare] $stationWare = $tSwapStations[$stationWare]
$marines = $a.station -> get marines array if $marines $i = size of array $marines while $i dec $i = $marine = $marines[$i] = [THIS] ->load marine: $marine end $tValues['marines'] = $marines end
* add table to ship $stored.stations = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='pack.station.stored' skip if $stored.stations $stored.stations = table alloc if not $stored.stations[$stationWare] $aStored = array alloc: size=0 $stored.stations[$stationWare] = $aStored end $aStored = $stored.stations[$stationWare] append $tValues to array $aStored [THIS] ->set local variable: name='pack.station.stored' value=$stored.stations
* destroy the station @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock :
$vol = get volume of ware $stationWare $freespace = [THIS] -> get free volume of cargo bay if $vol > $freespace $text = sprintf: pageid=35 textid=1104263, $vol, $freespace, null, null, null display game tip: text=$text delay=0 return null end
= [THIS] -> add 1 units of $stationWare $a.station ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE]
* all play ships withou command shoul follow the TL $i = size of array $aFollow while $i dec $i = $ship = $aFollow[$i] @ START $ship -> call script !ship.cmd.follow.std : the target=[THIS] follow distance=2000 end
* watch the build signal, so we can reapply any production queues [THIS] ->add secondary signal: signal=SIGNAL_BUILTSTATION, script=!ship.signal.droppedstation, prio=20, name='dropstation' return null
sub.IsInQueue: $found = [FALSE] if $aReverseQueue do if find $ship in array: $aReverseQueue $found = [TRUE] end if $aRepairQueue do if find $ship in array: $aRepairQueue $found = [TRUE] end if $aRecycleQueue do if find $ship in array: $aRecycleQueue $found = [TRUE] end endsub return null
